segments.text: Shall we check your oil and tires ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just checked the oil myself , but you can check the tires .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( The attendants fill the tank , clean the windscreen , and add some air to the tires . ) All right , sir , that'll be $ 26.50 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll charge it . Here's my card .
segments.speaker: S2
